title: The Hobbit

description: A hobbit's unexpected journey to reclaim a dwarf kingdom from a dragon.

author: George Orwell
description: A chilling portrayal of a totalitarian future society.

description: In a dystopian future, teenagers must fight to the death on live TV.

description: A teenager's angst-ridden journey through New York City.
